items.title: 7 killed as devastating storm pounds central US with more rain, tornado threats
items.description: ​​A four-day, once-in-a-generation weather event is pounding the middle of the U.S. with destructive tornadoes and life-threatening flooding.

items.title: US stocks slide, Trump says tariff policy will 'never change'
items.description: Stock markets continued their slide on Friday morning amid the shockwaves of President Donald Trump's "Liberation Day" tariffs.

items.title: WATCH:  Dozens of tornadoes touch down during severe weather event
items.description: The same states in the Midwest and South that were slammed by deadly tornadoes braced for round two as a once-in-a-generation weather event strikes ag...

items.title: LIVE:  ABC News Live
items.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

items.title: WATCH:  Diver has close encounter with huge sunfish
items.description: A diver on an expedition off the coast of Cabo San Lucas, Mexico, captured stunning footage showing the moment another swam alongside a sunfish.
